title: dark star thresh thoughts
body:
Hi everybody,

Currently, dark star thresh's damnation in regards to collecting souls is a reddish colour. Wouldn't it be cooler if it was a purplish colour instead, it would better match the overall colour theme of the skin. Thoughts??

replies.body: you drugged? the souls are purple
You got literacy problems?? I said when he COLLECTS the souls, he glows a reddish colour. Learn to read and interpret next time angry nerd.
